physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features the portico of a building, and a garden that lies ahead. Two sets of balustrades attached to the columns adorn the portico. There are numerous potted plants, and there is a circular object at the centre of the garden.
title_text: 12 Scotts Road, Our Billett, 1946 Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: buildings (structures) porticoes residential structures gardens (open spaces)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Buildings Porticoes Dwellings Gardens
